thread.title: Grizzlies to host youth basketball Spring Break Clinic & Camp
thread.title_full: Grizzlies to host youth basketball Spring Break Clinic & Camp

author: Malcolm Moore
title: Grizzlies to host youth basketball Spring Break Clinic & Camp
text:
Grizzlies to host youth basketball Spring Break Clinic & Camp Each camp package includes two Grizzlies game tickets Posted: Feb 24, 2017 
The Memphis Grizzlies will host two Spring Break Camps the week of March 13 for youth ages 7-16. Each camp package includes expert instruction provided by Grizzlies Youth Basketball staff and two game tickets to an upcoming Grizzlies game. 
Campers will get the opportunity to develop their shooting, dribbling and defensive skills as well as the opportunity to “play where the pros play” during the Game Day Spring Break Clinic on Monday, March 13 at FedExForum from 1-4 p.m. Camp attendees will receive three hours of instruction and stay for the 7 p.m. tip-off of the Grizzlies vs. Bucks game for just $95. 
From March 14-17, a four-day long camp will be held at Collierville United Methodist Church from 9 a.m. – 4 p.m. For just $295, campers will receive two tickets to a Grizzlies game, 28 hours of skills and drills instruction, a reversible Grizzlies jersey and more. 
For a $25 discount, campers can register for both sessions for $365. 
2017 Memphis Grizzlies Spring Break Basketball Camps: DATE
